name: Organisemee
tag_list: task-management, todo-list, task-list, productivity, gtd, personal-productivity
overview:
Organisemee is a task management service that supports you keeping track of your tasks / to doâ€™s and projects.

With Organisemee you will accomplish your daily tasks as well as your longer-term objectives - in private and in business life.

What is Organisemee about? First, itâ€™s a website, where you can plan, create and manage your tasks. And where you can find contacts you want to assign tasks to â€“ and vice versa.

Second, itâ€™s a mobile solution, which provides you with almost the same features as the website â€“ just on the go. Currently we offer a mobile version that can be accessed by everybody through a browser in his or her phone. Sure we will offer apps for smart phones soon.

Third, Organisemee provides an approach on the website and tweets tips on Twitter how to get tasks done more efficiently.

What are the key features? a) Access anywhere: plan and create your tasks and lists in the web version, and manage them on the go â€“ in the supermarket, airport or cafe b) Sophisticated reminder: set several reminders for one task â€“ and donâ€™t forget a task anymore. You can receive reminders via email or SMS â€“ currently for free. c) Strong collaboration: assign tasks to your colleagues or family members. And see when they have finalized them â€“ or when they are late. d) Ease of use: We think we have implemented the right balance between features and simplicity. Our target audiences are modern woman and men â€“ and not just geeks.

The service can be condensed to our motto: We hope to support you in getting your task done!
